alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Jackson, northeastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 311 PM EDT/211 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Marianna to 17 miles northeast of Lynn Haven to near Panama City. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Vernon, Blountstown, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, College Station, Chipola, Camps Head, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Bennett and Porter Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
